text: The arrondissement of Belfort is an arrondissement in the Bourgogne-Franche- Comté region of France. It is the only arrondissement of the Territoire de Belfort department. ==Composition== ===Cantons=== The cantons in the arrondissement of Belfort are: # Bavilliers (9001) # Belfort-1 (9002) # Belfort-2 (9003) # Belfort-3 (9004) # Châtenois-les-Forges (9005) # Delle (9006) # Giromagny (9007) # Grandvillars (9008) # Valdoie (9009) ===Communes=== The communes of the arrondissement of Belfort are: # Andelnans (90001) #
